sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_L3_DWA_707
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/appl/DWASensorSirene/DWAX/c/src/DWAX_Task.c line 1036 Requirement is satisfied here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/appl/DWASensorSirene/DWAX/c/src/DWAX_Task.c line 2215
Requirement is not verified IF ((Klima_12.KL_Geblspng_Soll >= 1 AND Klima_12.KL_Geblspng_Soll =< 253) OR (Klima_12.KL_Geblspng_Fond_Soll >= 1 AND Klima_12.KL_Geblspng_Fond_Soll <= 253) OR (Klima_03.KL_Geblaese_Status >= 1 AND Klima_03.KL_Geblaese_Status =< 10) OR (Klima_03.KL_Geblaese_Fond_Status >= 1 AND Klima_03.KL_Geblaese_Fond_Status =< 10) OR Klima_03.KL_STH_aktiv == 1 OR Klima_03.KL_STL_aktiv == 1 OR Klima_03.KL_Restwaerme_aktiv == 1) then bStStandheizung := 1; else bStStandheizung := 0; ID: SWR_ICAS1_L3_DWA_707 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_L3_DWA_709

simplesect.para: Requirement is not satisfied

Requirement is not verified Defective ATWS sensor -> internal error
IF ( (s_KL_15 == off OR s_KL_15 == on) AND cp_DWA_verbaut== "verbaut" AND (pc_DWA_mit_IRUe== "aktiv" OR pc_DWA_mit_NGS== "aktiv" ) ) then ( IF ( DWASensors_01.DWASensor_Error== "normal" OR (DWASensore_01.DWASensor_IRUE_schaerfen == entschaerfen AND (DWASensors_01.DWASensor_IRUE_Status == unscharf) AND (DWASensore_01.DWASensor_NGS_schaerfen == entschaerfen AND DWASensors_01.DWASensor_NGS_Status == unscharf) ) then DTC_SensorDwaDefektInternerFehler := 0
ELSE IF (DWASensors_01.DWASensor_Error== "Fehler") then DTC_SensorDwaDefektInternerFehler := 1 (0x04090E) )
ID: SWR_ICAS1_L3_DWA_1282 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM
Requirement is not satisfied

Requirement is not verified ATWS sensor (NGS sensor) -> implausible signal
IF ( (s_KL_15 == off OR s_KL_15 == on) AND cp_DWA_verbaut== "verbaut" AND pc_DWA_mit_NGS== "aktiv" AND Within 30s after locking the car (enStDWAStatus == 1) ) then ( IF DWASensors_01.DWASensor_NGS_Winkel_unplaus == "unplausibel" then DTC_SensorDwaNeigungssensorUnplausiblesSignal := 1 (0x040A08)
IF DWASensors_01.DWASensor_NGS_Winkel_unplaus == "plausibel" then DTC_SensorDwaNeigungssensorUnplausiblesSignal := 0 )
Note: The signl enStDWAStatus depends on the time value in the parameter p_t_DWA_Voraktivierungszeit ID: SWR_ICAS1_L3_DWA_1284 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM
Requirement is not satisfied

Requirement is not verified ATWS sensor (IRUE sensor) -> implausible signal

IF DWASensors_01.DWASensor_IRUE_Signal_unplaus == "plausibel" then DTC_SensorDwaInnenraumueberwachungUnplausiblesSignal := 0 )
Note: The signl enStDWAStatus depends on the time value in the parameter p_t_DWA_Voraktivierungszeit ID: SWR_ICAS1_L3_DWA_1285 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

Requirement is not verified ATWS sensor slave -> open load/defect

IF DWASensors_01.DWASensor_Slave_unplaus == "plausibel" then DTC_SensorDwaSlaveUnterbrechungDefekt := 0 )
Note: The signl enStDWAStatus depends on the time value in the parameter p_t_DWA_Voraktivierungszeit ID: SWR_ICAS1_L3_DWA_1286 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM
Requirement is not satisfied

Requirement is not verified ATWS sensor -> no basic setting
IF ( (s_KL_15 == off OR s_KL_15 == on) AND (cp_DWA_verbaut== "verbaut") AND (pc_DWA_mit_IRUe== "verbaut" OR pc_DWA_mit_NGS== "aktiv" ) ) then ( IF DWASensors_01.DWASensor_NotConfigured == "nicht konfiguriert" then DTC_SensorDwaKeineGrundeinstellung := 1 (0x040205)
IF DWASensors_01.DWASensor_NotConfigured == "Konfiguration OK" then DTC_SensorDwaKeineGrundeinstellung := 0 )
ID: SWR_ICAS1_L3_DWA_1287 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM
Requirement is not satisfied

Requirement is not verified 0x04050B - Scheibenbruchsensor (Option Audi: Heckscheibenbruch) -> Unterbrechung
IF (pc_DWA_aktiv == "aktiv" AND cp_DWA_HSB_HSK_ueberwachung_aktiv == "aktiv") then ( IF (StHeckscheibe.bHSBruchErkannt == 1) then set DTC: 0x04050B := prefail
IF (StHeckscheibe.bHSBruchErkannt == 0) then set DTC: 0x04050B := prepass )
ID: SWR_ICAS1_L3_DWA_1594 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM
Requirement is not satisfied

Requirement is not verified Measurement Value "Bereitschaft NGS" The values shall be set as follows: "nicht aktiv"; IF (DWASensors_01.DWASensor_NGS_Status == unscharf) "Schärfungsphase"; IF (DWASensors_01.DWASensor_NGS_Schaerfungsphase == Schärfungsphase aktiv) "aktiv"; IF (DWASensors_01.DWASensor_NGS_Status == scharf) "nicht codiert / nicht verbaut"; IF (pc_DWA_mit_NGS == nicht verbaut) "keine Kommunikation"; IF (s_Timeout_DWASensors_01 == aktiv)
Measurement Value "Alarm durch NGS erkannt" The values shall be set as follows: "ja"; IF (DWASensors_01.DWASensor_NGS_Alarm == Alarm) "nein"; IF (DWASensors_01.DWASensor_NGS_Alarm == kein Alarm) "nicht codiert / nicht verbaut"; IF (pc_DWA_mit_NGS == nicht verbaut) "keine Kommunikation"; IF (s_Timeout_DWASensors_01 == aktiv) ID: SWR_ICAS1_L3_DWA_1271 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM
Requirement is not satisfied

Requirement is not verified Measurement Value "Bereitschaft IRUE Sensor" The values shall be set as follows: "inaktiv"; IF (DWASensors_01.DWASensor_IRUE_Status == unscharf) "Schärfungsphase"; IF (DWASensors_01.DWASensor_IRUE_Schaerfungsphase == Schärfungsphase aktiv) "Stufe 1"; IF (DWASensors_01.DWASensor_IRUE_Status == geschaerft Level 1) "Stufe 2"; IF (DWASensors_01.DWASensor_IRUE_Status == geschaerft Level 2) "Stufe 3"; IF (DWASensors_01.DWASensor_IRUE_Status == geschaerft Level 3) "Stufe 4"; IF (DWASensors_01.DWASensor_IRUE_Status == geschaerft Level 4) "Stufe 5"; IF (DWASensors_01.DWASensor_IRUE_Status == geschaerft Level 5) "Stufe 6"; IF (DWASensors_01.DWASensor_IRUE_Status == geschaerft Level 6) "nicht codiert / nicht verbaut"; IF (pc_DWA_mit_IRU == nicht verbaut) "keine Kommunikation"; IF (s_Timeout_DWASensors_01 == aktiv)
Measurement Value "Alarm durch IRUE erkannt" The values shall be set as follows: "ja"; IF (DWASensors_01.DWASensor_IRUE_Alarm == Alarm) "nein"; IF (DWASensors_01.DWASensor_IRUE_Alarm == kein Alarm) "nicht codiert / nicht verbaut"; IF (pc_DWA_mit_IRU == nicht verbaut) "keine Kommunikation"; IF (s_Timeout_DWASensors_01 == aktiv) ID: SWR_ICAS1_L3_DWA_1272 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

ID: SWR_ICAS1_L3_DWA_1602 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_L3_DWA_1532
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/appl/DWASensorSirene/DWAX/c/src/DWAX_Task.c line 1841 Requirement is satisfied here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/appl/DWASensorSirene/DWAX/c/inc/DWAX_Task.h line 214
Requirement is not verified IF ( RTE_E_OK == retValbStrgSNDSchaerfenLibRequest AND (status of storing Master code generation exceeds maximum number of retries OR Master code was generated properly )) then < bStrgSNDSchaerfenLIN := bStrgSNDSchaerfenLibRequest >
Note: The DWA shall delay transmission of the arming request to the sounder only until the safety code has been successfully stored. The DWA shall make sure that in case of a disarming request of the SW-component DWA, this request is transmitted with the same safety code as the one used for arming.
ID: SWR_ICAS1_L3_DWA_1532 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_L3_DWA_1543
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/appl/DWASensorSirene/DWAX/c/src/DWAX_Task.c line 769 Requirement is satisfied here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/appl/DWASensorSirene/DWAX/c/src/DWAX_Task.c line 838 Requirement is satisfied here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/appl/DWASensorSirene/DWAX/c/src/DWAX_Task.c line 1403 Requirement is satisfied here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/appl/DWASensorSirene/DWAX/c/src/DWAX_Task.c line 2079 Requirement is satisfied here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/appl/DWASensorSirene/DWAX/c/src/DWAX_Task.c line 2380
Requirement is not verified IF ((Master code == 0x00 OR Master code == 0xFF) AND counter of attempts <= 2) then <Generate master="" code>="">
ELSE IF ((Master code == 0x00 OR Master code == 0xFF) AND counter of attempts > 2) then < The DTC 0x040611 set to NOT_OK > < Master code := 0x00 > ELSE <The DTC 0x040611 set to OK>
Note: bStSounderSafeLedDTCAktiv is activated or deactivated based on DTC status. Detailed behavior is defined in SWR_ICAS1_L3_DWA_1499.
Note: In case of unsuccessful master code generation up to two more attempts shall be performed. If all three attempts will be unsuccessful the DTC 0x040611 should be set N_OK otherwise in case of successful master code generation DTC 0x040611 should be set OK. ID: SWR_ICAS1_L3_DWA_1543 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_L3_DWA_1541
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/appl/DWASensorSirene/DWAX/c/src/DWAX_Task.c line 769 Requirement is satisfied here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/appl/DWASensorSirene/DWAX/c/src/DWAX_Task.c line 838 Requirement is satisfied here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/appl/DWASensorSirene/DWAX/c/src/DWAX_Task.c line 1449 Requirement is satisfied here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/appl/DWASensorSirene/DWAX/c/src/DWAX_Task.c line 2080 Requirement is satisfied here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/appl/DWASensorSirene/DWAX/c/src/DWAX_Task.c line 2418
Requirement is not verified IF ( status of storing Master code in the EEPROM == NOT_OK AND counter of attempts <= 2) then <Storage master="" code="" in="" the="" eeprom>="">
ELSE IF ( status of storing Master code in the EEPROM == NOT_OK AND counter of attempts > 2) then <The DTC 0x040711 set to NOT_OK> < Master code := 0x00 > ELSE <The DTC 0x040711 set to OK>
Note: Immediately after Master code generation it shall be stored in NVMRam. It shall be verified that storage in NVRam is successful. In case of unsuccessful storage up to two more attempts shall be performed. If all three attempts will be unsuccessful the DTC 0x040711 should be set N_OK otherwise in case of successful storage DTC 0x040711 should be set OK.
Note: bStSounderSafeLedDTCAktiv is activated or deactivated based on DTC status. Detailed behavior is defined in SWR_ICAS1_L3_DWA_1499. ID: SWR_ICAS1_L3_DWA_1541 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

Requirement is not verified Measurement Values "Bereitschaft Sirene" The values shall be set as follows: "nicht aktiv"; IF (Sounders_01.Sounder_Status == unscharf) "aktiv"; IF (Sounders_01.Sounder_Status == scharf voller Empfang) "nicht verbaut"; IF (pc_DWA_mit_Einfachhorn == verbaut) "keine Kommunikation"; IF (s_Timeout_Sounders_01 == aktiv)
Measurement Values "Alarm durch Sirene erkannt" The values shall be set as follows: "ja"; IF (Sounders_01.Sounder_Alarm == Ein) "nein"; IF (Sounders_01.Sounder_Alarm == Aus)
Measurement Values "Sirene Alarmausgabe" The values shall be set as follows: "ja"; IF (Sounders_01.Sounder_Aktiv == aktiv) "nein"; IF (Sounders_01.Sounder_Aktiv == inaktiv) ID: SWR_ICAS1_L3_DWA_1259 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_L3_DWA_1477
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/appl/DWASensorSirene/DWAX/c/src/DWAX_Task.c line 454 Requirement is satisfied here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/appl/DWASensorSirene/DWAX/c/src/DWAX_Task.c line 1918
Requirement is not verified IF ( (s_KL_15 == off OR s_KL_15 == on) AND cp_DWA_verbaut==1 AND (pc_DWA_mit_IRUe==1 OR pc_DWA_mit_NGS==1) ) then ( IF( electric error in the corresponding LIN_Sensor == "active" (DTC 0x04090E) OR Sensor-ATWS -> no signal/communication == "active" (DTC 0x040904) OR LIN 4 - electric error == "active" (0x100154) OR LIN 4 - no communication == "active" (0x100254) ) then enStDWASensorKommErrSt := 1; else enStDWASensorKommErrSt := 0; ) Note: LIN errors are described in GW_Ereignisspeicher: GW_Dia_Err_296 and GW_Dia_Err_304
ID: SWR_ICAS1_L3_DWA_1477 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_L3_DWA_1480
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/appl/DWASensorSirene/DWAX/c/src/DWAX_Task.c line 696 Requirement is satisfied here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/appl/DWASensorSirene/DWAX/c/src/DWAX_Task.c line 729 Requirement is satisfied here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/appl/DWASensorSirene/DWAX/c/src/DWAX_Task.c line 2027
Requirement is not verified IF ( (s_KL_15 == off OR s_KL_15 == on) AND cp_DWA_verbaut==1 AND (pc_DWA_mit_IRUe==1 OR pc_DWA_mit_NGS==1) ) then ( IF( Sensor-DWA defekt -> interner Fehler (DTC 0x04090E) == "active" OR Sensor-ATWS -> no signal/communication (DTC 0x040904) == "active" OR Sensor-DWA -> keine Grundeinstellung (0x040205) == "active" OR Sensor-DWA (Innenraumüberwachung) -> unplausibles Signal (0x040B08) == "active" OR Sensor-DWA Slave -> Unterbrechung/Defekt (0x040C0E) == "active" OR Sensor-DWA (Neigungssensor)->unplausibles Signal (0x040A08) == "active" ) then bStDWASensorSafeLedDTCAktiv := 1 else bStDWASensorSafeLedDTCAktiv := 0 ) ID: SWR_ICAS1_L3_DWA_1480 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

simplesect.para: Requirement is not satisfied

Requirement is not verified IF ( cp_DWA_verbaut==1 AND pc_DWA_mit_Einfachhorn == "LIN-Sounder verbaut" AND ( electric error in the corresponding LIN_Sounder (DTC 0x04120E) == "active" OR Sirene-ATWS -> no signal/communication (DTC 0x041304) == "active" OR LIN 4 - electric error (0x100154) == "active" OR LIN 4 - no communication (0x100254) == "active" ) ) then enStSNDKommErrSt := 1 ELSE enStSNDKommErrSt := 0
Note: To set enStSNDKommErrSt := 1 status of LIN_Message_Status(Sounders_01) should be different from "No Error" Note: LIN errors are described in GW_Ereignisspeicher: GW_Dia_Err_296 and GW_Dia_Err_304
IF LIN_Message_Status(Sounders_01) == NoError then enStSNDKommErr := 0x00 ElSE IF LIN_Message_Status(Sounders_01) == TimeoutError IF ( cp_DWA_verbaut==1 AND pc_DWA_mit_Einfachhorn == "LIN-Sounder verbaut" AND ( electric error in the corresponding LIN_Sounder (DTC 0x04120E) == "active" OR Sirene-ATWS -> no signal/communication (DTC 0x041304) == "active" OR LIN 4 - electric error (DTC 0x100154) == "active" OR LIN 4 - no communication (DTC 0x100254) == "active" ) ) then enStSNDKommErr := 0x01 ELSE enStSNDKommErr := 0x00 ELSE enStSNDKommErr := 0x02 ID: SWR_ICAS1_L3_DWA_1698 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM
Requirement is not satisfied

Requirement is not verified The error signal value (lost communication with the sounder) from the Low Power component should be transmitted to the DWA library by the signal bStSNDKommUeberwachAktiv.
Note: DTC related to "Kein Signal/Kommunikation" is reported by BSW LIN Error Handler after communication lost. Reporting process of this DTC is described in SWR_ICAS1_L3_DWA_1278 ID: SWR_ICAS1_L3_DWA_1549 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

ELSEIF (enStDWAAlarmquelle == 4 (doorContactBackwardsRight)) then DWA_Alarmquelle := 3
ELSE DWA_Alarmquelle := enStDWAAlarmquelle

Requirement is not verified IF CAN_Message_Status(Anhaenger_01) == NoError then enAnhaengerErrSt := 0x00; ELSE IF CAN_Message_Status(Anhaenger_01) == TimeoutError IF ((P.s_KCAN_Comm_Active == true) AND (TimeoutDelayElapsed ==true) ) then enAnhaengerErrSt := 0x01; ELSE enAnhaengerErrSt := 0x02; ELSE enAnhaengerErrSt := 0x02;
Robustness measure : A delay of 50ms should be applied for enAnhaengerErrSt signal in case of NoError transmission (because of the communication between AAG ecu and ICAS1 ecu)
Note: TimeoutDelayElapsed is described in SWR_ICAS1_L3_DWA_1694. ID: SWR_ICAS1_L3_DWA_1689 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM
